content.intro: <0>I am a <1>Spiced Academy</1> graduate and currently work for <2>nexum AG</2>, where I have been involved on projects for <3>SVTI</3>, <4>die mobiliar</4> and <5>Niessing</5>, among others. I enjoy creating easily accessible and usable websites and apps.</0>
content.work: Here you can find a selection of projects I have worked on recently. Click on the link to learn more!

about.p-1: I was not always a web developer, though. I also have over 10 years experience in the music industry as a sound engineer, producer and stagehand. During this time I met many different people and learned to respond to their individual needs.
about.p-2: I constantly educate myself to be able to decide which technology will best fit a project. The result will be an intuitive, performant and easily accessible product, taking current development best practices into account. These are some of the technologies I am familiar with:
about.p-3: In order to ensure that the website / application is displayed and functions correctly as far as possible everywhere, I test it extensively in the following browsers:

content.contact: If you’re interested in working with me, I’d love to hear from you!
